subject: Order #SSN2811 shipping update
description_text:
Hi,

I hope you’re well.

I placed an order middle of last week (#SSN2811) and was wondering if it’s shipped yet please? It’s a gift for my husband’s birthday this Thursday so I’m hoping it’s already in transit!

Thanks,
Alyssa Bracco

conversations.body_text: Hi Alyssa Bracco,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959529422
